attributes.action: Lobby the UN in association with other members of the security council to force the Generals in Miramar,(Burma) to allow International Aid Agencies direct access to the peoples of the Delta.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lobby the UN in association with other members of the security council to force the Generals in Miramar,(Burma) to allow International Aid Agencies direct access to the peoples of the Delta so that food and other humanitarian aid can be delivered to those who have nothing, especially the orphan children, without appropriation by government and local officials. It is nothing short of criminal that the Miramar government is preventing such aid. This needs to be backed up with sanctions against the regime.
